p:
ENMs were run using the ensemble modeling approach in the R package biomod2 version 3.3-7 ( 44). Models were replicated 10 times (five for models with low sample sizes, n < 50) using the cross-validation approach. Model performance was evaluated based on total ensemble model area under the receiver operator curve scores, TSS, and comparison with null models (see
SI Appendix for ENM running procedures).
